Convolutional Dictionary Learning
=================================

Batch CDL
---------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   Learn a convolutional dictionary (consensus method, greyscale images) <cbpdndl_cns_gry>
   Learn a convolutional dictionary (PGM method, colour images, multiscale colour dictionary) <cbpdndl_pgm_clr>
   Learn a convolutional dictionary (parallel consensus method, greyscale images) <cbpdndl_parcns_gry>
   Learn a convolutional dictionary (parallel consensus method, colour images) <cbpdndl_parcns_clr>
   Learn a convolutional dictionary (consensus method, video data) <cbpdndl_video>
   Learn a convolutional dictionary with spatial masking (consensus method, greyscale images) <cbpdndl_md_gry>
   Learn a convolutional dictionary with spatial masking (consensus method, colour images) <cbpdndl_md_clr>
   Learn a convolutional dictionary from colour images using custom sparse coding and dictionary update <cbpdndl_jnt_clr>
   Learn a convolutional dictionary without preprocessing of training data by inclusion of a gradient term in the optimisation problem <cbpdndl_grd>
   Compute a convolutional dictionary update via the convolutional constrained MOD problem (consensus method, greyscale images) <ccmod_cns_gry>
   Compute a convolutional dictionary update via the convolutional constrained MOD problem (PGM algorithms, greyscale images) <ccmod_pgm_gry>
